title: My Axe Is Notched (4R52)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, place a [Dwarven] token on this card. While you can spot X [Dwarven] tokens on this card and the same number of [Elven] tokens on Final Count, Gimli is strength +X (limit +3).
Rarity:	R
Notes:	The strength bonus derived from this condition is based on the lowest number of tokens on either card. For example: If there are two [Elven] tokens on Final Count and three [Dwarven] tokens on My Axe Is Notched, the strength bonus is +2.
